FuncDef:
The l2tpv3 remote session-id command configures the remote session ID.
The undo l2tpv3 remote session-id command deletes the remote session ID.
By default, the remote session ID is 0xffffffff.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the remote session ID.
The value is a hexadecimal integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Session IDs are used for interoperation between the local and remote devices of an L2TPv3 tunnel.
Prerequisites
L2TPv3 has been enabled using the l2tpv3 enable command.
An L2TPv3 tunnel has been configured using the l2tpv3 pw command.
